name: VoBadge
description: Adds a VO (Version Originale) badge to series posters when the content is only available in the original language without the preferred language audio track.
overview: Visual Indicator for Original Language Content

versions.changelog: Fixed: Switched to event-driven mode to avoid 'Cannot deserialize unknown type' errors at startup. Badges now applied via ItemAdded/ItemUpdated events. Use library scan to apply badges to existing items.
Critical fix: EnumerateAllItems() now properly queries library using ILibraryManager.GetItemList() instead of reflection. Should now process existing items at startup.
